NotificationTemplate.subject: You e-mail address has changed!
NotificationTemplate.body:
Hello {{ $UserName }},

This is a notification to inform you that your e-mail address has been changed by {{ $authenticatedUser }} to this new address. You should receive an e-mail at your old address ({{ $Email }}) which contains an activation link.

For security purposes, your account will not permit login until the owner of your previous e-mail re-activates the account.

If you did not change your e-mail address, please contact support personnel immediately
